entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • System.Net.Http.WinHttpHandler.StartRequestAsync assertion failed #83486
  • Segmentation fault while executing System.Net tests in linux x64 coreclr #83482
  • System.Net native crash in mono linux x64 #83481
  • SignedCms with Expired certificate but valid timestamp fails with validation #83478
  • [API Proposal]: Add System.Web.IHtmlString and System.Web.HtmlString to System.Web.HttpUtility #83477
  • [API Proposal]: Support Asynchronous Signing in System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509SignatureGenerator #83476
  • [API Proposal]: Allow the DesignerSerializationVisibilityAttribute to be used on a class? #83474
  • [API Proposal]: APIs to expose managed objects to COM #83471
    8.0.0
  • Could not resolve SDK location on mac #83469
  • [mono][aot] link static System.Private.CoreLib.dll.a symbol not found #83460
    8.0.0
  • x64 OSX installer test failed #83459
  • System.Numerics.BigInteger: Add/Subtract performance can be improved when size of arguments are different #83457
  • SslStream fails to authenticate in .NET 7.0 but works in .NET 6.0 #83455
    8.0.0
  • Create proxy when deserialize #83454
  • Blazor Wasm Debugging appears to be broken in Chrome 111.0.5563.65 #83452
  • DebuggerTests.AsyncTests.DebuggerTests.AsyncTests.InspectLocalsWithSameNameInDifferentScopesInAsyncMethod_CSharp times out #83449
  • Heap corruption on .NET Tiered Compilation Worker thread detected with mcheck (Ubuntu 18.0.4 .NET 6 (and 7) #83445
  • [wasm] System.Runtime.Tests exiting silently on main #83443
  • Where is the `ServiceBase.CanHandleSessionChangeEvent` ? #83450
  • .Net 7-iOS: Why is the interpreter needed in .Net7 but not in Xamarin.iOS? #83442
  • Intermittent `!AreCetShadowStacksEnabled() || UseSpecialUserModeApc()` assertion when embedding CoreCLR #83437
  • Publishing Blazor WebAssembly With AOT results in a broken app #83466

Closed

  • Accessing a field of a Vector4 causes later codegen to be inefficient if inlined #10045
    Future
  • Inefficient codegen for floating-point operations #1342
    Future
  • Determine how to handle SIMDIntrinsicGetZero, SIMDIntrinsicInit, SIMDIntrinsicUpperSave, and SIMDIntrinsicUpperRestore #37043
    Future
  • Can't build in an ARM64 Windows machine, fails in crosscompontents step #83343
  • Adding direct support for graphics please. #64732
    Future
  • When I use the IP the remote server refuse connection #74093
    8.0.0
  • [jitstress] HardwareIntrinsics_ro fails with "process cannot access the file" error #83298
    8.0.0
  • [mono] Roslyn csc operations sometimes hangs on ppc64le #82847
  • JIT: fold unreachable cases for switch #65368
    8.0.0
  • Huge memory usage regression in dotnet 7 on linux #79633
    8.0.0
  • ObjectFactory should verify against a `null` serviceProvider #82315
    Future
  • W3C Traceparent header is not set by HttpClient #83227
    8.0.0
  • [wasm] make it possible to enable emscripten assertions `-s ASSERTIONS=1` #74346
    8.0.0
  • [wasm] Allow user to set `-s ENVIRONMENT` setting #62708
    8.0.0
  • Channel<T> swallows items #83440
  • NativeAOT doesn't generate IL3000 and IL3001 - access to Assembly.Location property #82475
    8.0.0
  • ILLink analyzer produces both IL3000 and IL3002 for AssemblyName.CodeBase method #83088
    8.0.0
  • Test failure readytorun\\fieldlayout\\fieldlayout\\fieldlayout.cmd #83431
  • JsonSerializerOptions should provide explicit control over chained IJsonTypeInfoResolvers #83095
    8.0.0
  • .NET 6 Managed `ThreadPool` / `Thread` performance and reliability degradations #62967
    Future
  • GeneratedComInterface methods don't match Com ABI #83289
    8.0.0
  • Misleading error "Cannot delete an already deleted object" #80167
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • use ROSpan in SslStreamCertificateContext #83485
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Unity managed runtime type name parsers #83484
    area-System.Reflection
  • SyntaxValueProvider: avoid performance issue with syntax list containing many items #83483
    area-Extensions-Logging
  • Ensure free buffer space when reading TLS messages #83480
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Change LSRA to more efficiently initialize the availableRegs array #83479
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Do not run embuilder minimal build #83475
    NO-MERGE, area-Build-mono
  • Update xarch to track more instruction metadata as flags #83473
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Avx512 equality #83470
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [Mono] Intrinsify max/min on ARM64 with mini JIT #83468
    area-Codegen-Intrinsics-mono
  • Add linux-musl-riscv64 RID #83465
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • toolchain.cmake: properly set toolchain for crossbuilding on Alpine Linux #83464
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Fix BeginReceiveMessageFromV4BoundToSpecificV6_NotReceived #83463
    area-System.Net.Sockets
  • [release/7.0] JIT: fix bug in cloning conditions for jagged array (#83414) #83462
    Servicing-consider, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.x
  • Change `callvirt` into `calli` for virtual delegates #83461
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Replace a load with cheaper mov instruction when possible #83458
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Re-order some blocks in runtimelookup #83453
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Improve and enable writing test wrappers to disk #83444
    test-enhancement
  • WIP: Optimize `ComputeLastIndex` #83441
    area-System.Memory, community-contribution
  • Fix reflection invoke file format issue for generic methods #83438
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add host tests for asset resolution behaviour without fallback graph #83434
    area-Host
  • Runtime lookup clean up, enable for helper-based tail calls #83430
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Merged

  • Add property to get owner composite executable #83339
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Add lowering for get_One, get_AllBitSet, createScalar(), createScalarUnsafe(). #83402
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [Codespaces] Fix prebuild by using newer dotnet sdk #83331
    area-Infrastructure
  • Revert "[wasm] Add a monitoring phase to jiterpreter traces and discard unproductive ones (#83432)" #83446
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Jiterpreter-mono
  • Specify compacting GC in ObjWriter #83447
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • throw specific Authentication exception for ephemeral keys on Windows #83436
    area-System.Net.Security, os-windows, 8.0.0
  • Switch tests for --depsfile to mocked components #83435
    test-enhancement, area-Host
  • [wasm] Fix threading startup after emscripten bump #83352
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • JIT: Fold unreachable cases for switch in importer. #82793
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • JIT: fix bug in cloning conditions for jagged array #83414
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • ObjectFactory should verify against a null serviceProvider #82739
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, community-contribution
  • Fix Test Watcher Timeouts and Log Checker File Reading Issues #83427
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [Mono] Add more binary op intrinsics for ARM64 mini JIT #83337
    area-Codegen-Intrinsics-mono
  • JIT: Remove "add copies" phase #83310
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [browser] fix noisy tests #83448
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • [browser] new EmccEnableAssertions and EmccEnvironment MSBuild props #82954
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • Produce IL3000 and IL3001 from NativeAOT compiler #83253
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Misleading error "Cannot delete an already deleted object" #83410
    area-System.DirectoryServices, community-contribution
  • EventPipe container types optimizations. #83251
    area-Tracing-mono
  • Bump webpack from 5.68.0 to 5.76.0 in /src/mono/sample/wasm/node-webpack #83418
    arch-wasm, area-codeflow, javascript
  • [wasm] Add INTERP_OPT_JITERPRETER so that jiterp is disabled in debug mode #83363
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, area-Codegen-Jiterpreter-mono
  • Implement JsonSerializerOptions.TypeInfoResolverChain. #83358
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • Enable EventSource in ILC #83433
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasm] Add a monitoring phase to jiterpreter traces and discard unproductive ones #83432
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Jiterpreter-mono
  • Implement HResult swapping for generated COM methods. #83348
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator
  • Fix spurious exception while compiling optimized code #83324
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasm] Disable a failing System.Drawing.Primitives test. #83397
    area-System.Drawing

Updated

  • Fixes #79187 Add MemoryMappedFile.CreateFromFile(SafeFileHandle) overload #83134
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [wasm][debugger] Debug CI #83266
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Optimize stackalloc zeroing via BLK #83255
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Reduce number of gen 2 GC under high memory load #83328
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Implement `ToggleBit` #83400
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Remove System.Drawing.Common from runtime #83356
    area-System.Drawing
  • Adding support for Vector512 bitwise operations: And, AndNot, Or, OnesComplement, and Xor #83354
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, arch-avx512
  • Use SOS to dump managed stack traces from a dump on Windows #82867
    NO-MERGE, area-Infrastructure
  • Print the state when the align instructions don't match up #83286
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [tasks] Add auto runtime initialization template to LibraryBuilder #83050
    area-Build-mono
  • Add x86 intrinsics to improve CRC32 performance #83321
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • Initial changes for GetLocaleInfoString #81470
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios
  • [wasm] Post 3.1.30 emscripten bump feedback #83391
    8.0.0
  • Implements Requires*Attribute on class behavior for NativeAOT #83417
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Create source generator for configuration binding #82179
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.0
  • Remove S.S.Permissions reference from S.DirectoryServices #82453
    area-System.DirectoryServices, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, 8.0.0
  • Change execution order conditions for intellisense swapping and copying msbuild targets. #83117
    documentation, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Change IsolatedStorageFile path for mobile #83380
    area-System.IO, os-android, os-ios
  • [browser] Fix encoding problem when publishing #82833
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • JIT: Prototype a generalized promotion pass #83388
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [eventpipe] Perform endian aware serialization of structs and arrays above FireETW layer #80493
    area-Tracing-coreclr, community-contribution
  • POC for HttpRequestException error codes #82399
    NO-MERGE
  • Arm64: Combine if conditions into compare chains #79283
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [loader] Does find_method_in_class really see null method entries? #83335
    area-AssemblyLoader-mono
  • Take advantage of simplifications enabled by folding all indirect access to locals #79722
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Convert to GeneratedRegexAttribute fixer should preserve references to const string fields #81997
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, community-contribution
  • Enable mono runtime to handle SIGTERM like CoreCLR #82806 #82813
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution
  • Emit GC info into a COMDAT section #83371
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [browser] cleanup of early startup code #83411
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • CoreCLR support for InlineArrayAttribute. (struct layout part) #82744
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr
  • Bump webpack from 5.68.0 to 5.76.0 in /src/mono/sample/wasm/browser-webpack #83420
    arch-wasm, area-codeflow, javascript
  • [NativeAOT] Support exporting methods from referenced assemblies in a formal way #83396
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix paths in "Stripping symbols" message #82215
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [RISC-V] coreclr-jit directory #82379
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • dotnet workload install wasm-tools hangs #31228
    Discussion
  • Emit a warning when EmbeddedResourceUseDependentUponConvention is true and first type in a file doesn't match file name. #31219
  • [NetSDKE2E][Loc][VS64] With .NET 8 preview 3 SDK installed on German OS, warning description is unlocalized when running "dotnet publish -r win10-x64" in CLI. #31213
  • [NETSDKE2E][Regression] Publishing blazorwasm project is blocked by"Emscripten Deadlocked" warning. #31209

Closed

  • Updated Visual Studio 2022 to 17.5.2 and can pair with Mac #31207

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.2xx' => 'release/7.0.3xx' #31233
    Area-Infrastructure
  • add --create-manifest-if-needed flag #31231
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.1xx' => 'release/7.0.2xx' #31226
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.3xx' => 'main' #31214
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • Merging internal commits for release/7.0.1xx #31189
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'release/7.0.1xx' #31202
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.3xx' => 'release/6.0.4xx' #31192
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'release/6.0.3xx' #31191
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • [draft] moving dotnet/sdk-container-builds to dotnet/sdk #31181
  • Don't add AOT package in restore for < net7 #31201
    Area-NativeAOT
  • WebAssembly SDK #31154
    Area-Infrastructure

entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Extension shadowing #7061

Closed

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • EnC doesn't detect local function closure to lambda closure udpate #67323
  • Re: Why can't we declare a top-level delegate returning a value-tuple? #67311
  • Diagnostic reported on property symbol name shouldn't be classified as a non-local diagnostic #67310
  • EnC: stackalloc not detected across data member initializers #67307
    Backlog

Closed

  • Intermediate Generator outputs #63291
    C# 12.0
  • Finalize naming strategy for Primary Constructor parameters backing fields #67103
    17.6
  • Implement EE support for Primary Constructors #67107
    C# 12.0
  • VerifyLocalVariableRename is flaky #67245
  • AlignOpenBraceWithMethodDeclaration is flaky #67244
  • AbstractEditorInlineRenameService.SymbolRenameInfo.CanRenameAttributePrefix has buggy implementation #45895
    Backlog
  • Shift-Enter commits completion, but doesn't complete the current statement #18065
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Improve perf of resolving local symbol keys #67324
    Area-IDE
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 2136292 #67321
  • Implement LSP inlay hints #67319
    Area-IDE
  • Remove descendent node tracking from SyntaxEditor #67314
    Area-IDE
  • Fixup local diagnostic classification for arrow expression clause analyzers #67312
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers

Merged

  • Do not make cross-process calls to try to find references to local symbols #67322
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Disable IDE0090 (use target typed new) in compiler layer #67309
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Update BCL versions to .NET 7 #66561
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Compute TextChange based on syntax instead of text #67120
    Area-IDE, Next
  • 17.5 port of #67315 (Disable analyzer telemetry for all but lightbulb invocation path) #67318
    Area-IDE
  • Disable analyzer telemetry for all but lightbulb invocation path #67315
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Switch integration CI to Preview queue #67143
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #67316
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Implement support for captured Primary Constructor parameters in EE when portable PDB is used. #67266
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Primary Constructors, Next
  • Improve EnC test helpers, add repro for #67243 #67252
    Area-Compilers, Area-Interactive, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #67313
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Port Rename and Formatting tests to the new framework #67020
    Next
  • Update Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Testing to 1.1.2-beta1.23163.2 #67298
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #67308
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Move to one upstream ingestion feed #67263
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #67306
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next

Updated

  • Disallow pointers inside generic type-arguments unless in an unsafe context (in C#12 and beyond). #67282
    Area-Compilers
  • Annotate MS.CA and MS.CA.C# for trimming #66519
    Area-Compilers
  • Bump Microsoft.ServiceHub.Framework to 4.2.70-beta #67071
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Implement 'Make field/property required' codefix #67175
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Implement Required Members for VB #66084
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Required Members
  • Hook up DidChangeConfiguration from client #66861
    Area-IDE
  • Do not use the Lsp-Misc workspace in VS scenarios #67287
    Area-IDE
  • Framework compilers package for SDK consumption #66206
    Area-Compilers
  • Better parser error recovery when encountering a open generic name. #67278
    Area-Compilers
  • Allow missing placeholders and locals in RefSafetyAnalysis visitor #67092
    Area-Compilers
  • [Lightbulb Perf] Analyzer driver fixes for span-based analysis #67255
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers
  • Avoid binding lambdas unnecessarily in some error scenarios #59733
    Area-Compilers
  • Generate branchless IL for `(b ? 1 : 0)` #67191
    Area-Compilers
  • Preserve empty NodeStateTable entries #66963
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Embed mono-config.json inside blazor.boot.json #47243
  • Utilize new StaticWebAssets SDK #47242
  • Theme: Cloud Native #47240
    .NET 8.0
  • Support reading DisableInferBodyFromParameters at runtime #47239
    8.0-preview4
  • Blazor app crashes when debugging after updates #47238
  • Add test scenarios for nullable return types in route handlers for RDG #47237
    8.0-preview4
  • Perf regression: multiple_queries, updates #47236
  • Perf regression: fortunes_dapper, fortunes_ef, multiple_queries #47235
  • Update Identity UI to use Blazor Components #47233
    8.0-preview5
  • Support account lockout with identity endpoints #47232
    8.0-preview4
  • Add reset password support to identity endpoints #47231
    8.0-preview4
  • Add 2fa support to token identity endpoints #47230
    8.0-preview4
  • Support changing username and email using identity endpoints #47229
    8.0-preview4
  • Add token refresh endpoints to identity #47228
    8.0-preview4
  • Add API endpoints for generating identity JWT tokens #47227
    8.0-preview4
  • Remove Duende from SPA and Blazor WASM project templates #47226
    8.0-preview5
  • Quarantine BlazorWasmStandaloneTemplate_Works #47225
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Only invoke 'IsService' check once in resolution #47224
    8.0-preview3
  • ValidationProblemDetails does not deserialize as expected #47223
  • Missing Dependency in AddAuthorization #47220
  • StateHasChanged blazor issue called using a context menu #47219
  • Blazor QuickGrid Dynamic Columns #47218
    Backlog
  • Different logging behaviour between net 6 and 7 for Request Body in HttpLoggingMiddleware #47216
    8.0-preview4
  • Perf regression: fortunes_dapper, fortunes_ef, fortunes_ef #47213
  • Perf regression: fortunes, fortunes_ef, plainTextNoParamsEmptyFilter #47212
  • „Method not found: 'Boolean System.Collections.BitArray.HasAllSet()'.” #47208

Closed

  • Intermittent hang in asp net core module #47063
  • RequestDelegateGenerator throws NullReferenceException in ASP.NET Core 8 preview 2 #47202
  • [QuickGrid] Miscellaneous TODOs #47137
  • Blazor WASM project fails to publish when updating WebCompiler nuget package #47201
  • Add 'RenderTreeBuilder.AddComponentParameter()' #46575
    8.0-preview3
  • Mismatch in request field names between swagger and gRPC to JSON transcoding #46670
  • Why is Blazor deploying Microsoft.CodeAnalysis? #47215
  • Logout does not work when using AddOidcAuthentication #31088 #46489
  • Perf regression: fortunes_ef #47161
  • Perf regression: mvc, single_query #47184
  • Perf improvement: updates #47193
  • JObject as api result, but return a null array #47091
  • RDG doesn't get JSON serialization info for awaitable response types #47192
    .NET 8 Planning

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove unnecessary trimming workarounds #47241
    area-security
  • Add SectionName to SectionOutlet and SectionContent #47221
    area-blazor
  • Update gRPC template to use 2.52.0 #47214
    area-grpc
  • Handle Task/ValueTask.CompletedTask return in RDG #47211
    area-runtime
  • Make TLS & QUIC Pay-for-Play #47209
    area-runtime

Merged

  • Skip BlazorWasmStandaloneTemplate_Works #47234
    area-mvc, 8.0-preview3
  • More precise CPU instruction set specification for ASP.NET composite #47207
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview3
  • Add src/DefaultBuilder/ to area-hosting #47206
    area-infrastructure, area-runtime, 8.0-preview3

Updated

  • [release/7.0] Fix sending to another client from OnConnectedAsync #47204
    Servicing-approved, area-signalr, 7.0.x
  • Ability to monitor Blazor Server circuit activity #46968
    area-blazor
  • RDG array handling. #47086
    area-runtime
  • Introduce per-HealthCheckRegistration parameters #42646
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks, pending-ci-rerun
  • [Web.JS] call mono_wasm_gc_lock in MonoHeapLock #46909
    area-blazor, pending-ci-rerun
  • Issue 33368, Solution to resolve "System.InvalidOperationException" inside "HandleForbiddenAsync" method. #47089
    area-security, community-contribution
  • Only invoke 'IsService' check once in resolution #47097
    area-runtime
  • Add short circuit in routing #46713
    area-runtime, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • Meter factory prototype #46834
    area-runtime, * NO MERGE *

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Question] What is the intended way that namespaces in platform-specific folder work? #13972
  • IsEnabled is unable to update visual appearance #13971
  • Set Focus on custom control #13969
  • Color.Equals() returns true for Colors with small difference #13968
  • Border Left and Right Margins Dont work on iOS, works well on Android #13965
    Backlog
  • RadioButton TextColor Doesnt work on iOS it is always black, works well on Android #13964
    Backlog
  • AmbiguousMatchException when BindableProperty is hidden in a derived class and is then set in XAML #13962
    Backlog
  • MAUI Blazor: Referencing RCL to MAUI Blazor project triggers error on Android publishing #13961
  • switch and underline #13950
  • Button, switch #13949
  • TableView blows up on iOS/Catalyst when using SceneDelegate #13948
    Backlog
  • Fatal signal 11 (SIGSEGV), code 1 (SEGV_MAPERR) on Opening Maps when running on Release mode on .net 8.0 Preview . #13947
  • [Android] ItemSpacing degrades scrolling performance of CollectionView #13946
    Backlog

Closed

  • Path does not update its layout when Data is modified #13802
    Backlog
  • This is definitely an issue #13967
  • .NET MAUI MVVM OneWay bindings issues #6571
    Backlog
  • CollectionView items layout is not changed when GridItemsLayout.Span is changed on iOS and Windows #10144
    Backlog
  • CollectionView with GridItemsLayout: Issues when changing Span #8387
    .NET 8 Planning
  • [Windows] CollectionView ItemSpacing is not working #4112
    Backlog

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • InvalidOperationException with GroupBy() #30495
  • lambda Where clause with !string.Contains produces incorrect SQL #30493
  • android.runtime.JavaProxyThrowable: System.InvalidOperationException: You specified a password in the connection string, but the native SQLite library you're using doesn't support encryption. at Microsoft.Data.Sqlite.SqliteConnection.Open () #30492
  • How does ChangeTracker know that something was changed? #30490
  • EF core 7 is not allowing to map multiple properties of an entity with single database column whereas it was working in earlier EF Core versions #30488
  • Running il formed ef tool command does not yield helpful output #30487

Closed

  • Regression in v7.0.4: "Unable to cast object of type..." when using nullable primary key #30489
  • Use strings as identifiers in the in-memory database rather than model references #30364
    8.0.0-preview3
  • Add NuGet Package README file for EFcore #30467
  • Integer value 0 is not set on INSERT when field has different default value #30463
  • Automatically trim trailing spaces from query join clause with AsTracking #30449
  • Json column fails to materialize only when default interceptor used #30244
    8.0.0
  • EF7 generating incorrect SQL for the Concat/Union All, The same code was working fine for EF6.4.4 #30273
    7.0.5

PullRequests

Created

  • Generate compiled relational model #30494

Merged

  • Fix to #30244 - Json column fails to materialize only when default interceptor used #30403
  • Stop using model references as identifiers in the in-memory database #30477
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'main' #30485
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, type-merge forward :fast_forward:

Updated

  • Add readme file for nuget package EFCore.Tools #30470
  • Add readme for sql server #30466
  • Add readme for EF core Nuget Package #30469
  • [release/7.0] Fix to #30358 - Duplicate table alias in generated select query (An item with the same key has already been added) #30486
    Servicing-consider, 7.0.x

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-15
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • About latest dotnet@6 release #15602
